1) State of Assam
    Advocate - D K Deka

acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Case record is received from JMFC on commitment accused Sarsing Terang and Sanjay Bey are absent without step. Issue sumon to the accused with a notice to their bailor.
Accused remained absent without step. Issue NBWA against the accused.

Accused surrendered with bailor Accused Sarsing Terang has surrendered before the court and filed a petition petition praying for allowing him to remain on previous bail stating the ground mention in the petition. Also seen the petition filed by the bailor stating that he has no objection if the accused person is allowed to go previous bail. Heard ld. Lawyers of both sides. Perused the case record. Considering all aspects the prayer is allowed. Co-accused Sanjay Bey remained absent. NBWA issued against the accused is not yet returned. Issue remainder to the OC concern to execute the warrant on or before the next date positively.
Accused Sar Sing terang is present along with his ld counsel. Co accused Sanjay Bey remained absent. NBWA issued against the Accused Issue remainder to the OC concern

Accused Sarsing Terong is present along with his learned counsel.Co-accused Sanjoy Bey remained absent. NBWA issued against the accused is returned unexecuted with a report that the address mention in the warrent is under Manja PS.Reissue as per report .

Accused Sarsing Terang is present along with his learned counsel.Co-accused Sanjay Bey remained absent. NBWA issued against the accused is returned unexecuted with a prayer to fixed another date and same is accepted.
Court is closed due to holiday.
Accused persons  remained absent.Issue NBWA against the accused and also notice to the bailor.
Accused Sarsing Terang is present.Another accused sanjoy Bey remained absent.NBWA issued against the accused is returned unexecuted with a prayer to fixed another date and same is accepted.
Accused present.

Accused Sarsing Terang has surrendered before the court and filed a petition praying for allowing him to go on previous bail on the ground stating in the petition.Heard learned lawyers of both sides.Perused the case record.Considering all aspects the prayer is allowed.Recall warrant if issued.Another accused Sonjoy Bey remanined absent.NBWA issued against the accused is not yet returned.Issue reminder to the OC concern for execution of warrant on or before next date.
For App
For App
app
NBWA issued against accused Sarsing Terang and Sonjoy Bey not returned. Issue fresh NBW/A against them. Also issue notice to bailor.
NBWA issued returned with report. Issue fresh notice to bailor not returned. Issue frssh
NBWA issued against accused persons returned with report. issue fresh as per report.Notice to bailor return after service. Re-issue the the notice.
NBWA issued against accused returned with report. Also NBWA issued to accused Sarsing Terang not returned. Issue fresh NBWA against them.Notice to bailor not returned. Issue fresh notice.
Accused Sarsing Terang Is produced and remanded back to Custody. Issue NBWA and PA Against accused Sanjay Bey. Issue notice to bailor of Accused Sanjay Bey.

Sarsing Terang is produced from jail hazot and further remanded. NBWA and PA Issued against the accused person sanjay Bey is not returned,re issue the same. Notice to bailor not returnrd. Re issue the same.

Accused Sri Sarsing Terang is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date. EO Sri Deepmoni Hazarika is present. He is examined and discharged. I have very carefully gone through the EO and reports on P/As issued against the warrantee accused Sri Sanjay Bey. I find P/As issued against the aforesaid warrantee accused was properly served and as such same are accepted. Hence the warrantee accused person Sri Sanjay Bey is hereby declared as absconder and case against him is filed till his arrest.         Copy is furnished to the accused person Sri Sarsing Terang. Having very carefully gone through the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers of the both sides as well as case diary I find the accused person facing trial committed the offence under sections 457 of the IPC/8 of the POCSO Act and according the charge is framed. The particular of the offence charged is duly ready over and explained to the accused person facing trial to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issued summons to PWs.         Seen the bail petition filed by one Sri Johan Terang praying for allowing the accused Sri Sarsing Terang to go on bail on the ground stated in the petition supported by an affidavit. Heard learned lawyers of the both sides. Considering all aspects the bail prayer is allowed. Accordingly the accused Sri Sarsing Terang is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 10,000/- with a local surety of like amounts.        Fixing 21.12.2019 for evidence.
accused present.PWs absent. summon not returned. Issue fresh

Case record is received on transfer from Honble Sessions Judge, Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.Accused Sarsing Terang is present.PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not returned, issue fresh summons to PWS.
accd absent,        PWs absent, summons issued to PWS not returned, issue fresh summons to PWS
